actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 5520 of title 5, United States Code, relating to the withholding of city taxes from the pay of Federal employees.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Treasury from reporting to any city requiring the withholding of city taxes from the pay of employees the name, address, other identifying particulars, or pay of any Federal employee unless release of such information is ordered by a United States district court as necessary to the conduct of a criminal investigation.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5520 of title 5, United States Code, relating to the withholding of city taxes from the pay of Federal employees.
